title: ROS: Can't start gazebo. Offscreen rendering problem

content.raw:
I can't start Gazebo with a fresh installation of Ubuntu 12.04 LTS and then apt-get ros-fuerte-*

The output of lspci |grep VGA

00:02.0 VGA compatible controller: Intel Corporation Mobile 915GM/GMS/910GML Express Graphics Controller (rev 03)

In the details panel of system settings

Graphics: Intel® 915GM x86/MMX/SSE2
Experience: Standard

The cpu flags: fpu vme de pse tsc msr pae mce cx8 apic sep mtrr pge mca cmov clflush dts acpi mmx fxsr sse sse2 ss tm pbe nx up bts est tm2

For exact trials/logs, check the thread: http://answers.ros.org/question/47959/cant-start-gazebo/

Please find attached the exact output of the command:
roslaunch gazebo_worlds debug.launch

Thanks
